entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
